医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
化疗过量：一项常见的基因测试每年可以挽救数百人的生命2021 年 1 月的一个早晨，卡罗尔·罗森 (Carol Rosen) 接受了转移性乳腺癌的标准治疗。可怕的三周后，她在剧烈的疼痛中死去，而这种药物本来可以延长她的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Overdosing-on-chemo-A-common-gene-test-could-save-hundreds-of-lives-each-year.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Overdosing-on-chemo-A-common-gene-test-could-save-hundreds-of-lives-each-year.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e2b4ed9-bd31-47cd-8707-7236a933a9ba Tue, 26 Mar 2024 08:24:36 -0400 Overdosing on chemo: A common gene test could save hundreds of lives each year
研究发现，维生素 D 在针对衰老的生物机制方面显示出前景目前已知维生素 D (VitD) 对调节某些衰老特征的潜在作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Vitamin-D-shows-promise-in-targeting-agings-biological-mechanisms-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Vitamin-D-shows-promise-in-targeting-agings-biological-mechanisms-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29210a3b-a1ff-4d18-b150-bb52de5e9f2c Tue, 26 Mar 2024 07:37:00 -0400 Vitamin D shows promise in targeting aging's biological mechanisms, study finds
尽管某些年龄组取得了进展，但全球抗击结核病的斗争未能达到 2020 年世界卫生组织的里程碑全球、国家和区域结核病的负担和趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Global-fight-against-TB-misses-2020-WHO-milestones-despite-progress-in-certain-age-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Global-fight-against-TB-misses-2020-WHO-milestones-despite-progress-in-certain-age-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a348c6f-71cf-4918-ab1d-1f8c237bb64c Tue, 26 Mar 2024 07:11:00 -0400 Global fight against TB misses 2020 WHO milestones, despite progress in certain age groups
综合研究显示全球总生育率自 1950 年以来减少了一半以上对 1950 年至 2100 年 204 个国家和地区过去和未来生育率趋势的综合估计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Compressive-study-reveals-global-total-fertility-rate-more-than-halved-since-1950.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Compressive-study-reveals-global-total-fertility-rate-more-than-halved-since-1950.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e866fa99-3292-499e-9ee3-dd0931e5c308 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 06:48:00 -0400 Comprehensive study reveals global total fertility rate more than halved since 1950
更好地诊断神经退行性疾病：用于 α-突触核蛋白检测的皮肤活检被证明是有效的痴呆症患者皮肤磷酸化 α-突触核蛋白 (P-SYN) 沉积的阳性率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Towards-better-diagnosis-of-neurodogenic-disorders-Skin-biopsy-for-ceb1-synuclein-detection-proves- effective.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Towards-better-diagnosis-of-neurodogenic-disorders-Skin-biopsy-for-ceb1-synuclein-detection-proves- effective.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15de3927-4934-461d-b5e0-509cd4aeabd7 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 06:20:00 -0400 Towards better diagnosis of neurodegenerative disorders: Skin biopsy for α-synuclein detection proves effective
可穿戴呼吸传感器的新兴趋势旨在个性化医疗保健解决方案使用可穿戴呼吸传感器监测温度、气流和湿度等呼吸参数，并检测各种呼吸生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Emerging-trends-in-wearable-breath-sensors-aim-at-personalized-healthcare-solutions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Emerging-trends-in-wearable-breath-sensors-aim-at-personalized-healthcare-solutions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ebcbf15-c1e2-4f1c-95ad-d747e6394398 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 05:38:00 -0400 Emerging trends in wearable breath sensors aim at personalized healthcare solutions
研究揭示了宫颈阴道液中子宫内膜癌早期检测的蛋白质特征血浆和宫颈阴道液中的蛋白质组特征用于子宫内膜癌检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-unveils- Protein-signatures-for-early-detection-of-endometrial-cancer-in-cervico-vaginal-fluid.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-unveils- Protein-signatures-for-early-detection-of-endometrial-cancer-in-cervico-vaginal-fluid.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87584db9-fe75-4262-83b4-ec4cb6c9357f Tue, 26 Mar 2024 04:52:00 -0400 Study unveils protein signatures for early detection of endometrial cancer in cervico-vaginal fluid
广泛研究发现地中海饮食与降低痴呆风险有关荟萃分析显示，在老年人中，坚持地中海饮食与降低患痴呆症（尤其是阿尔茨海默病）的风险之间存在正相关关系，强调了饮食作为痴呆症预防策略中可改变的危险因素的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-lower-dementia-risk-finds-extective-review.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-lower-dementia-risk-finds-extective-review.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8eed173-e18a-465c-b4b5-30e53b4b7a7b Tue, 26 Mar 2024 01:23:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet linked to lower dementia risk, finds extensive review
EAT-Lancet 饮食坚持五年内可缩小腰围，但体重不变研究发现，五年后坚持 EAT-Lancet 饮食与体重变化之间没有显着关系，但发现与腰围存在轻微的负相关，这表明从长远来看，它对降低肥胖风险和腰围有潜在的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/EAT-Lancet-diet-adherence-shrinks-waistlines-but-not-weight-over- Five-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/EAT-Lancet-diet-adherence-shrinks-waistlines-but-not-weight-over- Five-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=564879e2-4680-477e-bf5d-2aa63d8a05b9 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 23:48:00 -0400 EAT-Lancet diet adherence shrinks waistlines but not weight over five years
开发用于治疗视网膜脱离的藻酸盐水凝胶在韩国，考试前喝海带汤是禁忌，因为这会导致考试不及格。这种信念源于这样的想法：海藻的滑性可能会导致人们在测试过程中滑倒和摇摇晃晃。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Alginate-based-Hydrogel-development-for-treatment-of-retinal-detachment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Alginate-based-hydrogel-development-for-treatment-of-retinal-detachment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24115482-6e9a-4e47-abbf-e7c79324ad0a Mon, 25 Mar 2024 23:47:54 -0400 Alginate-based hydrogel developed for treatment of retinal detachment
